channel.title: Connecting to server issues [637 Dementhium]
channel.description:
Hello!
My server works with Hamachi, others can play etc etc. But when I create a server no-ip host and correctly portforward*, I attempt to connect to my server with both my no-ip host name and my IP, it doesn't work. It simply states the generic:
"error_game_js5connect"
I'm pretty sure I'm doing nothing wrong. I've port forwarded it, tested with Hamachi, I'm getting to the end of my patience. :confused:
Any help appreciated!
*http://www.canyouseeme.org/ says that port 43594 is open and accessible.

item.title: Connecting to server issues [637 Dementhium]
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

[quote=“couttiiee, post:2, topic:462467”]As a host you connect to the server with the ip of 127.0.0.1, all other players must use your no-ip.

so if you dont have an ip changer client. create two clients and send with the no-ip to others and keep the other one for your self with the ip set to 127.0.0.1[/quote]

This is incorrect, I have just tested this out on my VPS connected with the same IP other people do. and it works. This is no longer a valid statement.

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting to server issues [637 Dementhium]
item.dc:creator: @couttiiee couttiiee
item.description:
@couttiiee wrote:

As a host you connect to the server with the ip of 127.0.0.1, all other players must use your no-ip.

so if you dont have an ip changer client. create two clients and send with the no-ip to others and keep the other one for your self with the ip set to 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
